title: GG EZ
body: Is typing "GG EZ" or something along those lines a reportable? Yes I admit I'm butthurt, okay, me playing a game and losing a match has already made me butthurt enough but then you get the enemy team saying "EASY"or "GG EZ" makes me even more butthurt, so I would like to ask if it's possible to do anything about those players?

replies.body:
Ehat purpose does trash talking serve after the completion on a match? If the match is over I will report trash talking like this with zero hesitation

Edit - fuck it I'll answer the question for you.
The only purpose it serves is to stroke the offenders epeen by belittling the recipient. You know what else shares the same description? Bullying.

If your epeen is that small that you have to stroke it after a match, then perhaps it is you that needs to grow up and drop your balls before you're satisfied with its size

> [{quoted}](name=fattyhotdogs,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZiFRzygd,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-04-01T04:27:30.177+0000)
>
> Ehat purpose does trash talking serve after the completion on a match? If the match is over I will report trash talking like this with zero hesitation
> 
> Edit - fuck it I'll answer the question for you.
> The only purpose it serves is to stroke the offenders epeen by belittling the recipient. You know what else shares the same description? Bullying.
> 
> If your epeen is that small that you have to stroke it after a match, then perhaps it is you that needs to grow up and drop your balls before you're satisfied with its size

have you never played sports before? trash talking is a part of competition. no matter what sport, what country, what language, there is always trash talking. saying gg ez is the simplest and easiest form of trash talk. If you can't shrug off someone saying gg ez then you shouldn't be playing games.

here's a fact. the world is full of assholes. everyone is an asshole. no matter where you go, what you do, you will meet assholes. trying to protect yourself from assholes is futile. there will always be assholes. the best thing you can do is ignore it have it not affect you.

Yes mate, I played sport for 13 years. While I was obviously always on the winning side, you know what we did after a game? We shook hands and said 'good game' or 'well done mate' or something of good nature like that. I call that sportsmanship. Not once in 13 years did I hear someone say 'easy game' to the opposition.

Yes, there will always be ass holes. But to just accept that fact and be an ass hole yourself? You are the reason that fact is true.

Give this man a raise! =)

I've played bball and indoor football for 20 + years now. Never in sports have I had anyone say to me at the END of a game EZ. Always line up shake hands GG and thank the ref.
Judging by the rude and profranity in your reply, I'm guessing your one of the people who likes to piss people off and troll and also most likely immature as well.
Hey I'm a uni student and I'm one of the lowest scum of the earth!

> [{quoted}](name=PubgamerAU,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZiFRzygd,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2016-04-01T05:06:00.405+0000)
>
> I'm one of the lowest scum of the earth!

I highly doubt that.

How to counter gg ez

Step 1 play ezreal

Step 2 when someone says it say "thx fam"

two ways to counter GG ez

1. get a box of tissues and cry yourself to sleep
2. relax and dont let 14 year old neckbeards get to you. "to recieve a polluted stream without getting dirty, one must become an ocean"
I remember reading somewhere ages ago that you can report it, as it isn't sportsmanlike in the least.

clearly 'gg ez' poisons the community

honestly if anyone's going around having a cry about this then just harden up, jesus.

> [{quoted}](name=Keroseen,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZiFRzygd,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-03T02:20:15.842+0000)
>
> clearly 'gg ez' poisons the community
> 
>in all  honesty though if anyone's going around having a cry about 'gg ez' then just harden up, jesus.

I can always find a reason to report at least one person each game. Whether it be swearing or being unsportsmanlike. I just think of it as the trash takes themselves out. That being said I am not perfect, I've been ill mannered and have been justly reported before. I have tried hard to change my ways but slip back in to bad habits every now and then.
It's not a nice thing to say, but it shouldn't be punishable. Too many things in League of Legends are punishable, it's turning LoL into a 'safe space', which is ridiculous.
